source_sink Module Reference
transport

Source interface to be fulfilled by driver or application Specifically, the user must set the "source" pointer (a variable in this module) to a subroutine that meets the compute_source interface. More...

interface  source_if
 Calculate source. More...

Public Member Functions

subroutine set_source (source_term)
subroutine no_source (source, conc, area, flow, ncell, nvar, time)
 Zero source implementation. This source term adds nothing (e.g., for conservative constituents)
subroutine set_linear_decay (rates, nvar)
 Sets the decay rate and sets the source term to linear decay.
subroutine linear_decay_source (source, conc, area, flow, ncell, nvar, time)
 Linear decay source. This source term multiplies each constituent by a decay rate.

Public Attributes

real(stm_real), dimension(:),
allocatable 		linear_decay
 linear decay rates for when linear source is used, should be nonpositive
procedure(source_if), pointer compute_source = > null()

Detailed Description

Source interface to be fulfilled by driver or application Specifically, the user must set the "source" pointer (a variable in this module) to a subroutine that meets the compute_source interface.

Member Function/Subroutine Documentation

subroutine source_sink::linear_decay_source ( real(stm_real), dimension(ncell,nvar), intent(inout)  source,
real(stm_real), dimension(ncell,nvar), intent(in)  conc,
real(stm_real), dimension(ncell), intent(in)  area,
real(stm_real), dimension(ncell), intent(in)  flow,
integer, intent(in)  ncell,
integer, intent(in)  nvar,
real(stm_real), intent(in)  time 
)

Linear decay source. This source term multiplies each constituent by a decay rate.

Parameters:
[in]ncellNumber of cells
[in]nvarNumber of variables
[in,out]sourcecell centered source
[in]concConcentration
[in]areaarea at source
[in]flowflow at source location
[in]timetime
